I am not sure if Jews have anything to do with it but vaccinations have definitely a detrimental effect on the human evolution on long terms.
But even considering only the health benefits vs the side effects of vaccinations they are very disputable.
Allergies, diabetes, autism and cancer rise is statistically related to the mass vaccinations.
